match.title: 1st Match

series.name: Tri-Nation Tournament in Bangladesh
series.description: Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, Zimbabwe in Bangladesh

dismissalText.commentary: Elton Chigumbura run out (†Mushfiqur Rahim) 64 (95b 5x4 1x6 98m) SR: 67.36

dismissalComment.html: makes room and heaves it over square leg, they attempt a second run but the throw from the deep is sharp and Rahim does well to slide to his right and whip off the bails

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Shakib Al Hasan b Naeem Islam
dismissalText.commentary: Stuart Matsikenyeri c Shakib Al Hasan b Naeem Islam 39 (51b 6x4 0x6 75m) SR: 76.47

dismissalComment.html: that's a stunning catch! He gets forward to chip it with the turn towards mid-on, Raqibul at short midwicket flings himself to his left and pulls off a stunner while airborne, he will cherish this catch for a long time

floated from outside off, the ball lands in line with the middle stump and goes through with the angle, Sibanda defends very close to the pads, Shakib persists with the appeal and the umpire Nadir Shah raises the finger

now Zimbabwe are in deep trouble, he gets it to turn sharply from over the wicket, Williams tries to work it to the on side but the ball hits his pads in line with the leg stump, he gets only half forward
gives it a lot of air on middle and off and tempts Utseya into going for the slog sweep, he gets a thick top edge and it sails straight in to Mahbubul's hands at deep square-leg

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalComment.html: that reverse sweep was bound to out him in his place at some point, he tries to cream  a  high full toss over the off side, Mortaza at short third man leaps up, fumbles initially but takes the catch at the second attempt

that's a stunning catch! He gets forward to chip it with the turn towards mid-on, Raqibul at short midwicket flings himself to his left and pulls off a stunner while airborne, he will cherish this catch for a long time

headshotImage.caption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: very soft dismissal, it's a long hop which should have been put away, he stays back at the crease and tamely punches it back to the bowler, he takes a very easy return catch

dismissalText.long: c sub (Rubel Hossain) b Mashrafe Mortaza
dismissalText.commentary: Hamilton Masakadza c sub (Rubel Hossain) b Mashrafe Mortaza 16 (16b 3x4 0x6 21m) SR: 100

dismissalComment.html: Mortaza bangs it in on a good length on the offstump and gets it to cut back in, he tries to defend close to his pads but he appears to get a thick inside edge on to his pad which lobs up to Shakib at square leg who runs forward, the appeal was initially for a lbw but he was given out caught, I need to see another replay of that

dismissalText.commentary: Vusi Sibanda lbw b Shakib Al Hasan 15 (35b 2x4 0x6 62m) SR: 42.85

dismissalComment.html: floated from outside off, the ball lands in line with the middle stump and goes through with the angle, Sibanda defends very close to the pads, Shakib persists with the appeal and the umpire Nadir Shah raises the finger

dismissalComment.html: now Zimbabwe are in deep trouble, he gets it to turn sharply from over the wicket, Williams tries to work it to the on side but the ball hits his pads in line with the leg stump, he gets only half forward

dismissalText.commentary: Keith Dabengwa c & b Naeem Islam 10 (25b 0x4 0x6 34m) SR: 40

dismissalComment.html: very soft dismissal, it's a long hop which should have been put away, he stays back at the crease and tamely punches it back to the bowler, he takes a very easy return catch

dismissalText.long: c Mahbubul Alam b Shakib Al Hasan
dismissalText.commentary: Prosper Utseya c Mahbubul Alam b Shakib Al Hasan 9 (28b 0x4 0x6 37m) SR: 32.14

dismissalComment.html: gives it a lot of air on middle and off and tempts Utseya into going for the slog sweep, he gets a thick top edge and it sails straight in to Mahbubul's hands at deep square-leg

image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.long: c Shakib Al Hasan b Mashrafe Mortaza
dismissalText.commentary: Ray Price c Shakib Al Hasan b Mashrafe Mortaza 17 (16b 2x4 0x6 21m) SR: 106.25

dismissalComment.html: easy take, Mortaza continues bowling the slow off cutters and this time he pitches it up, Price makes room and tries to cart him over long-on but he fails to get enough elevation and finds Shakib who takes it easily just before the rope

dismissalText.commentary: Elton Chigumbura run out (†Mushfiqur Rahim) 64 (95b 5x4 1x6 98m) SR: 67.36

dismissalComment.html: makes room and heaves it over square leg, they attempt a second run but the throw from the deep is sharp and Rahim does well to slide to his right and whip off the bails

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Shakib Al Hasan c †Taibu b Chigumbura 52 (66b 3x4 0x6 91m) SR: 78.78

dismissalComment.html: the bowling change works, Chigumbura adjusts the line closer to the offstump, the ball kicks up a bit on Shakin who shapes to cut square but he only ends up getting a thick edge to Taibu

headshotImage.caption: Raqibul Hasan player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Raqibul Hasan player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Raqibul Hasan player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Raqibul Hasan player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Raqibul Hasan b Dabengwa 23 (36b 2x4 0x6 55m) SR: 63.88

dismissalComment.html: that run-out miss didn't cost anything at all! He slips in a quicker one and Raqibul's beaten in flight as he gets forward to drive and the ball goes through straight and hits the stumps

headshotImage.caption: Junaid Siddique player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Junaid Siddique player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: not so sure if that was hitting the stumps, he delivers from round the wickets and gets the ball to drift away from the left-hander, Junaid gets forward and is hit on the pad but it didn't really look like hitting the offstump, no wonder Junaid was a little surprised at Doctrove's decison

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: now Ashraful goes and Bangladesh are in deep trouble, Ashraful gives him the charge and tries to clear long-on but fails to get the desired elevation, the ball dips on Sibanda and he manages to hang on to it very well on the dive

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalComment.html: Zimbabwe are clawing back and hard! Price teases him with flight and he gives him the charge and attempts to take him down town, he misses the ball completely and Taibu has the easiest of stumpings
and Zimbabwe win! Mahbubul tries to launch him downtown by stepping down the track, he fails to get the elevation to clear long-on and Matsikenyeri cups it just in front of the rope

headshotImage.longCaption: Junaid Siddique player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Zunaed Siddique lbw b Utseya 0 (2b 0x4 0x6 6m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: not so sure if that was hitting the stumps, he delivers from round the wickets and gets the ball to drift away from the left-hander, Junaid gets forward and is hit on the pad but it didn't really look like hitting the offstump, no wonder Junaid was a little surprised at Doctrove's decison

headshotImage.caption: Ed Rainsford player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ed Rainsford player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mushfiqur Rahim b Rainsford 0 (5b 0x4 0x6 5m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: Mushfiqur completely misjudges it! Rainsford lands it on a good length on the offstump and gets it to come back in, Mushfiqur shoulders arms and expects the ball to sail over the stumps but to his horror it clips the top of the offstump, excellent delivery to square him up and it's game on already at Mirpur

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Tamim Iqbal run out (†Taibu/Sibanda) 13 (40b 2x4 0x6 47m) SR: 32.5

dismissalComment.html: terrible mixup and Tamim can't believe what has happened, ashraful gives the charge and scoops it just over short midwicket, the throw from long-on is fired to the keeper, Ashraful isn't interested in the extra run but fails to notice that Tamim's already half way down the pitch, Tamim has no time to turn around and he gives up thanks to the accuracy of the throw

dismissalComment.html: now Ashraful goes and Bangladesh are in deep trouble, Ashraful gives him the charge and tries to clear long-on but fails to get the desired elevation, the ball dips on Sibanda and he manages to hang on to it very well on the dive

dismissalText.commentary: Shakib Al Hasan c †Taibu b Chigumbura 52 (66b 3x4 0x6 91m) SR: 78.78

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Mashrafe Mortaza run out (Chigumbura) 3 (11b 0x4 0x6 14m) SR: 27.27

dismissalComment.html: it's that man Chigumbura again! He taps it towards square leg and sets off for a quick  single, Chigumbutra gathers and in one motion effects a direct hit and Mortaza is a yard short, excellent fielding, the third umpire takes a look

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Naeem Islam run out (Williams) 21 (52b 1x4 0x6 49m) SR: 40.38

dismissalComment.html: another direct hit! He nudges it softly towards short midwicket and attempts a risky run, Williams gathers the ball and under arms the ball directly at the non-striker's end, the third umpire takes a look

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Mahbubul Alam c Matsikenyeri b Price 22 (28b 1x4 1x6 32m) SR: 78.57

dismissalComment.html: and Zimbabwe win! Mahbubul tries to launch him downtown by stepping down the track, he fails to get the elevation to clear long-on and Matsikenyeri cups it just in front of the rope

batsmen.shot: off side drive on front foot
off side drive on front foot

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mahbubul Alam c Matsikenyeri b Price 22 (28b 1x4 1x6 32m) SR: 78.57

commentTextItems.html: and Zimbabwe win! Mahbubul tries to launch him downtown by stepping down the track, he fails to get the elevation to clear long-on and Matsikenyeri cups it just in front of the rope

commentPostTextItems.html: So Zimbabwe win by 38 runs and begin the tri-series on a high. They've been at the receiving end of a lot of defeats at the hands of Bangladesh over the last few years and they've turned it around here. The way they bowled and fielded today would have given even the bigger teams a run for their money. Utseya led from the front by bringing himself on in the second over and setting a fine example with his bowling, keeping the batsmen in check. Can't say the same for Ashraful, who perished in an indiscreet manner yet again.

All in all a very professional performance by Zimbabwe, particularly Chigumbura, who scored an under pressure 62, got the wicket of Shakib and effected a direct hit. Here's the presentation. All the proceeds of this game go to Manjural Islam Rana.
Ashraful: "Batsmen made starts and didn't carry on. Very disappointing performance."
Utseya: "Starting 2009 with a win, not more than that. We've been working hard back home. There's still room for improvement."
Chigumbura is the Man of the Match. "My performance was a long time coming, I struggled in my last season. Hopefully I will continue my good form."

That's it from us. We thank you for your patience, after all the tech glitches this morning. We'll be back in two days for game two - Sri Lanka v Zimbabwe (9.00 am local time). Till then, it's goodbye!

commentPreTextItems.html: Price to bowl his final over

commentTextItems.html: comes over the wicket,  he stays at the crease and defends
makes room to crash it straight but he misses it completely

headshotImage.caption: Nazmul Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Nazmul Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

commentTextItems.html: tries to heave it away and it's a slower ball, he works it to the on side
ouch! Mahbubul fails to out away a full toss and it strikes him on the abdomen, he's on the turf in pain and they're reviving him
drives in front of cover and sets off quickly, they scamper through for the run
full outside off and driven to short cover
he rocks back and slams a short delivery over square leg, Bangladesh are trying to get closer

headshotImage.caption: Nazmul Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Nazmul Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

commentTextItems.html: charge down the track and he gets a thick outside edge past short third man
shuffles and nudges it down to short fine-leg
takes a couple of paces down the track and defends
flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends
punches a full delivery back down the ground

headshotImage.caption: Nazmul Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Nazmul Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: makes room and tries to launch him out of the ground but he fails to make any contact
gets across his stumps and works it down to deep midwicket
shuffles across his stumps and nudges it to midwicket
gets a friendly full toss but he mistimes the loft towards mid-off
he bowls it really wide of the offstump and he chases it and mistimes the drive back to the bowler

dismissalComment.html: very soft dismissal, it's a long hop which should have been put away, he stays back at the crease and tamely punches it back to the bowler, he takes a very easy return catch

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

headshotImage.caption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

headshotImage.caption: Ed Rainsford player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ed Rainsford player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c sub (Rubel Hossain) b Mashrafe Mortaza
dismissalText.commentary: Hamilton Masakadza c sub (Rubel Hossain) b Mashrafe Mortaza 16 (16b 3x4 0x6 21m) SR: 100

dismissalComment.html: Mortaza bangs it in on a good length on the offstump and gets it to cut back in, he tries to defend close to his pads but he appears to get a thick inside edge on to his pad which lobs up to Shakib at square leg who runs forward, the appeal was initially for a lbw but he was given out caught, I need to see another replay of that

dismissalText.commentary: Vusi Sibanda lbw b Shakib Al Hasan 15 (35b 2x4 0x6 62m) SR: 42.85

dismissalComment.html: floated from outside off, the ball lands in line with the middle stump and goes through with the angle, Sibanda defends very close to the pads, Shakib persists with the appeal and the umpire Nadir Shah raises the finger

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Mashrafe Mortaza b Naeem Islam
dismissalText.commentary: Tatenda Taibu c Mashrafe Mortaza b Naeem Islam 17 (19b 3x4 0x6 25m) SR: 89.47

dismissalComment.html: that reverse sweep was bound to out him in his place at some point, he tries to cream  a  high full toss over the off side, Mortaza at short third man leaps up, fumbles initially but takes the catch at the second attempt

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.long: c Shakib Al Hasan b Naeem Islam
dismissalText.commentary: Stuart Matsikenyeri c Shakib Al Hasan b Naeem Islam 39 (51b 6x4 0x6 75m) SR: 76.47

dismissalComment.html: that's a stunning catch! He gets forward to chip it with the turn towards mid-on, Raqibul at short midwicket flings himself to his left and pulls off a stunner while airborne, he will cherish this catch for a long time

dismissalText.commentary: Sean Williams lbw b Shakib Al Hasan 3 (13b 0x4 0x6 5m) SR: 23.07

dismissalComment.html: now Zimbabwe are in deep trouble, he gets it to turn sharply from over the wicket, Williams tries to work it to the on side but the ball hits his pads in line with the leg stump, he gets only half forward

headshotImage.caption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Keith Dabengwa c & b Naeem Islam 10 (25b 0x4 0x6 34m) SR: 40

dismissalComment.html: very soft dismissal, it's a long hop which should have been put away, he stays back at the crease and tamely punches it back to the bowler, he takes a very easy return catch

dismissalText.long: c Mahbubul Alam b Shakib Al Hasan
dismissalText.commentary: Prosper Utseya c Mahbubul Alam b Shakib Al Hasan 9 (28b 0x4 0x6 37m) SR: 32.14

dismissalComment.html: gives it a lot of air on middle and off and tempts Utseya into going for the slog sweep, he gets a thick top edge and it sails straight in to Mahbubul's hands at deep square-leg

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.long: c Shakib Al Hasan b Mashrafe Mortaza
dismissalText.commentary: Ray Price c Shakib Al Hasan b Mashrafe Mortaza 17 (16b 2x4 0x6 21m) SR: 106.25

dismissalComment.html: easy take, Mortaza continues bowling the slow off cutters and this time he pitches it up, Price makes room and tries to cart him over long-on but he fails to get enough elevation and finds Shakib who takes it easily just before the rope

dismissalText.commentary: Elton Chigumbura run out (†Mushfiqur Rahim) 64 (95b 5x4 1x6 98m) SR: 67.36

dismissalComment.html: makes room and heaves it over square leg, they attempt a second run but the throw from the deep is sharp and Rahim does well to slide to his right and whip off the bails

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Tamim Iqbal run out (†Taibu/Sibanda) 13 (40b 2x4 0x6 47m) SR: 32.5

dismissalComment.html: terrible mixup and Tamim can't believe what has happened, ashraful gives the charge and scoops it just over short midwicket, the throw from long-on is fired to the keeper, Ashraful isn't interested in the extra run but fails to notice that Tamim's already half way down the pitch, Tamim has no time to turn around and he gives up thanks to the accuracy of the throw

headshotImage.caption: Junaid Siddique player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Junaid Siddique player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Junaid Siddique player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Junaid Siddique player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Zunaed Siddique lbw b Utseya 0 (2b 0x4 0x6 6m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: not so sure if that was hitting the stumps, he delivers from round the wickets and gets the ball to drift away from the left-hander, Junaid gets forward and is hit on the pad but it didn't really look like hitting the offstump, no wonder Junaid was a little surprised at Doctrove's decison

headshotImage.caption: Ed Rainsford player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ed Rainsford player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mushfiqur Rahim b Rainsford 0 (5b 0x4 0x6 5m) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: Mushfiqur completely misjudges it! Rainsford lands it on a good length on the offstump and gets it to come back in, Mushfiqur shoulders arms and expects the ball to sail over the stumps but to his horror it clips the top of the offstump, excellent delivery to square him up and it's game on already at Mirpur

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Mohammad Ashraful player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mohammad Ashraful c Sibanda b Utseya 18 (21b 3x4 0x6 37m) SR: 85.71

dismissalComment.html: now Ashraful goes and Bangladesh are in deep trouble, Ashraful gives him the charge and tries to clear long-on but fails to get the desired elevation, the ball dips on Sibanda and he manages to hang on to it very well on the dive

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Shakib Al Hasan c †Taibu b Chigumbura 52 (66b 3x4 0x6 91m) SR: 78.78

dismissalComment.html: the bowling change works, Chigumbura adjusts the line closer to the offstump, the ball kicks up a bit on Shakin who shapes to cut square but he only ends up getting a thick edge to Taibu

headshotImage.caption: Raqibul Hasan player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Raqibul Hasan player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Raqibul Hasan player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Raqibul Hasan player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Keith Dabengwa player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Raqibul Hasan b Dabengwa 23 (36b 2x4 0x6 55m) SR: 63.88

dismissalComment.html: that run-out miss didn't cost anything at all! He slips in a quicker one and Raqibul's beaten in flight as he gets forward to drive and the ball goes through straight and hits the stumps

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

image.caption: Tatenda Taibu
image.longCaption: Tatenda Taibu portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Mehrab Hossain jnr st †Taibu b Price 2 (4b 0x4 0x6 3m) SR: 50

dismissalComment.html: Zimbabwe are clawing back and hard! Price teases him with flight and he gives him the charge and attempts to take him down town, he misses the ball completely and Taibu has the easiest of stumpings

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Naeem Islam player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Naeem Islam run out (Williams) 21 (52b 1x4 0x6 49m) SR: 40.38

dismissalComment.html: another direct hit! He nudges it softly towards short midwicket and attempts a risky run, Williams gathers the ball and under arms the ball directly at the non-striker's end, the third umpire takes a look

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Mashrafe Mortaza run out (Chigumbura) 3 (11b 0x4 0x6 14m) SR: 27.27

dismissalComment.html: it's that man Chigumbura again! He taps it towards square leg and sets off for a quick  single, Chigumbutra gathers and in one motion effects a direct hit and Mortaza is a yard short, excellent fielding, the third umpire takes a look

image.caption: Ray Price
image.longCaption: Ray Price portrait, World Cup 2011, February 11, 2011

dismissalText.commentary: Mahbubul Alam c Matsikenyeri b Price 22 (28b 1x4 1x6 32m) SR: 78.57

dismissalComment.html: and Zimbabwe win! Mahbubul tries to launch him downtown by stepping down the track, he fails to get the elevation to clear long-on and Matsikenyeri cups it just in front of the rope

headshotImage.caption: Nazmul Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Nazmul Hossain player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Nazmul Hossain not out 3 (13b 0x4 0x6 17m) SR: 23.07

notes: Zimbabwe innings
Power Play 2: Overs 10.1 - 15.0
Zimbabwe: 50 runs in 12.1 overs (74 balls), Extras 1
Zimbabwe: 100 runs in 26.2 overs (162 balls), Extras 5
Drinks: Zimbabwe - 129/6 in 37.0 overs (E Chigumbura 21, P Utseya 3)
Power Play 3: Overs 43.1 - 48.0
Zimbabwe: 150 runs in 43.2 overs (264 balls), Extras 5
E Chigumbura: 50 off 90 balls (4 x 4)
Zimbabwe: 200 runs in 49.4 overs (305 balls), Extras 13
Innings Break: Zimbabwe - 205/9 in 50.0 overs (T Mupariwa 1, EC Rainsford 0)
Bangladesh innings
Power Play 2: Overs 10.1 - 15.0
Bangladesh: 50 runs in 13.6 overs (86 balls), Extras 2
Drinks: Bangladesh - 61/4 in 17.0 overs (Shakib Al Hasan 14, Raqibul Hasan 13)
5th Wicket: 50 runs in 67 balls (Shakib Al Hasan 28, Raqibul Hasan 20, Ex 2)
Bangladesh: 100 runs in 28.2 overs (172 balls), Extras 3
Shakib Al Hasan: 50 off 64 balls (3 x 4)
Drinks: Bangladesh - 126/7 in 34.2 overs (Naeem Islam 13)
Power Play 3: Overs 42.1 - 47.0
Bangladesh: 150 runs in 42.2 overs (260 balls), Extras 10

stories.title: Zimbabwe upset hosts in series opener
stories.subTitle: Bangladesh v Zimbabwe, tri-series, 1st match, Mirpur
stories.summary: Elton Chigugumbura's fighting 64 and some disciplined bowling when defending a small total helped Zimbabwe post their first ODI win against a Test-playing nation since November 2007
